alert.note: Alert for Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 11:40AM EDT until March 27 at 5:41AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Rough River near Dundee affecting Ohio County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rough River near Dundee. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, County roads between Dundee and Narrows flood. At 26.0 feet, County roads near Sunnydale flood. At 27.0 feet, KY 919 flood at Underwood and Clifty Huff Roads near Narrows. At 28.0 feet, Trailer courts in Hartford flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 26.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM CDT Sunday was 26.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is cresting near 26.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 26.4 feet on 03/10/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index. php?wfo=lmk Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued this evening.
